title: Why Kanye West’s ‘Donda 2’ won’t stream on ‘oppressive’ Apple Music and Spotify
content:
Excited to stream Kanye West’s ‘Donda 2’ in your Apple Music library? Think again. The ‘College Dropout’ rapper announced today his newest album will only be released on his $200 Stem Player.

more…

The post Why Kanye West’s ‘Donda 2’ won’t stream on ‘oppressive’ Apple Music and Spotify appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Kanye West announced today his new album 'Donda 2' won't stream on Apple Music or other platforms; only his $200 Stem Player.
